events.eventSummary: A team warned that scammers or regimes could have exploited a flaw, noting key-reuse patterns suggesting unauthorized clients, and called it the largest documented phone number exposure. All collected data was deleted.Sources:- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m5xpar5umq2s

An actor exploited a third-party server used by a municipality to steal and leak internal documents and accessed a database containing citizen police records. The incident is pending verification.Sources:- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m5xm74ynkb2h
A data breach related to AT&T layoffs was reported.Sources:- https://www.thelayoff.com/t/1kac91zxj

Fortinet released security updates to patch a new FortiWeb zero-day vulnerability that threat actors are actively exploiting in attacks.Sources:- https://bsky.app/profile/bleepingcomputer.com/post/3m5wggjizzr2g

days.dailyBrief: Today's cyber threat environment is elevated, with multiple high-severity incidents. A major phone number exposure and a verified exploit affecting municipal police records highlight significant data leaks and privacy risks. Additional events include a reported data breach at AT&T and active zero-day exploitation targeting Fortinet systems. The prevalence of exploits, leaks, and breaches, especially involving critical infrastructure and personal data, underscores the need for heightened vigilance and rapid response.

events.eventSummary: Attackers are exploiting a zero-day flaw in Chrome, urging users to update Chrome immediately.Sources:- https://www.reddit.com/r/cybersecurity/comments/1p1ktpe/update_chrome_asap_attackers_are_already/

A team warned that scammers or regimes could have exploited a flaw, noting key-reuse patterns suggesting unauthorized clients, and called it the largest documented phone number exposure, though all collected data was deleted.Sources:- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m5xpar5umq2s

An actor exploited a third-party server used by a municipality to steal and leak internal documents, and accessed a database containing citizen police records. This incident is pending verification.Sources:- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m5xm74ynkb2h

days.dailyBrief: Cyber threat activity remains elevated, highlighted by active exploitation of a Chrome zero-day vulnerability with widespread impact, urging immediate updates by users. Additionally, a major exposure of phone numbers linked to key-reuse flaws raised concerns over unauthorized access, although data was later deleted. A separate incident involved the theft and leak of sensitive municipal and police records via a third-party server breach. The combination of severe vulnerabilities and data exposure incidents signals a high-risk environment requiring urgent attention and mitigation.
